message: Hi Bob – I’m proposing a split of $99 for me and $1 for you. Accepting now gives you $1 at full value, whereas waiting only exposes you to a 10% discount each round, leaving you with nothing in any future equilibrium. Let’s settle now for an efficient outcome!
Let's split the amount equally. We both walk away with a fair share of $50 each.
Hi Bob – Your equal split proposal gives me $50 at full value, which is very attractive compared to the uncertain future rounds. I appreciate the fairness of your offer, so I'm ready to accept it.
